footer.description: I am <mark>Nicolas Fernandez</mark>, a Fullstack Developer with 4+ years of experience in Web and Software Development. Specializing in <mark>JavaScript</mark>, <mark>TypeScript</mark>, <mark>React.js</mark>, <mark>Next.js</mark>, <mark>Nest.js</mark>, <mark>Express.js</mark>, <mark>Node.js</mark>, <mark>Postgress</mark>, <mark>Mysql</mark> and Devops practices such <mark>Docker</mark> and <mark>Github Actions</mark>. Currently based in Neuqu√©n, Argentina, and open to remote projects. I invite you to learn more about my skills, experience, and professional journey.
